annotations.description: Truth be told this drink definitely falls into the category of "Club Cocktail." or "Vacation Drink." Miami's namesake cocktail is a mashup of a Strawberry Da...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Miami Vice

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Light Rum
1oz (30ml) Coruba Dark Jamaican Rum
1.25oz (37.5ml) Pineapple Juice
1oz (30ml) Coconut Cream
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
2 Strawberries

Muddle 2 Strawberries with .25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup in glass
Shake Ingredients and pour into glass
Pineapple Fronds & Strawberry Fan Garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kAUGOQ0SGSc
title: Miami Vice
